title: Novogratz’s Crypto Conglomerate Galaxy to List on Nasdaq
description: Billionaire Michael Novogratz’s crypto conglomerate Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd has received permission for a direct listing on the Nasdaq stock exchange, with trading expected to happen shortly after special shareholder meeting, the company said in a press release.

title: Dave Portnoy estimates he’s lost $20 million after the Trump tariff-fueled stock market ‘bloodbath’
description: Barstool founder Dave Portnoy said he lost $20 million “in stocks and crypto" following the tariff-fueled market plunge.
